Name: CategorySchemeReference
Description: Contains descriptions of particular categories used as question responses and in the logical product. Their relationships and code values are described in the code scheme.

Name: CodeListSchemeReference
Description: Lists the code values used to represent categories for a variable or question. Also describes hierarchical relationships between categories used in the code scheme.

Name: ManagedRepresentationSchemeReference
Description: A scheme containing representations that are being managed as reusable sources for response domains and value representations.

Name: RepresentedVariableSchemeReference
Description: A set of RepresentedVariables managed by an agency. RepresentedVariables are the core reusable parts of a Variable. RepresentedVariable maps to the GSIM Represented Variable. In addition to the standard name, label, and description, allows for the inclusion of an existing RepresentedVariableScheme by reference and RepresentedVariables either in-line or by reference. RepresentedVariables may be grouped for management purposes.

Name: VariableSchemeReference
Description: Contains a collection of variables and variable groups.

Name: NCubeSchemeReference
Description: Contains a collection of NCubes and NCube groups.
